summary: The daughter of deaf-mute parents seeks their understanding when she discovers a love for music.
cast: Manisha Koirala|Nana Patekar|Salman Khan|Seema Biswas|Raghuvir Yadav|Priya Parulekar|Pratik Gala|Himani Shivpuri|Sunil Shende|Anil Mehta|Helen|Ashok Lokhande|Sunil Rege|Hargurjeet Singh|Sanjay Jha|Jaywant Patekar|Varna|Asif
title: Khamoshi: The Musical
